Package database

Class DatabaseAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.DatabaseAccess

extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to access the database

      • checkLogin

        public static int checkLogin​(java.lang.String username,
                             java.lang.String password)
        Check if the username exists and if the password is correct
        Parameters:
        username - The username
        password - The password
        Returns:
        -1 if username doesn't exist, 0 if password is incorrect, 1 if all is correct

      • createAccount

        public static void createAccount​(java.lang.String identifiant,
                                 java.lang.String motDePasse,
                                 java.lang.String typeDeCompte)
        Create user account (insert into the database)
        Parameters:
        identifiant - The username of the account
        motDePasse - The password of the account
        typeDeCompte - The type of the account ("Administrateur", "Utilisateur", "Elu")

      • updateAccount

        public static void updateAccount​(java.lang.String identifiant,
                                 java.lang.String typeDeCompte)
        Change the typeDeCompte of an account
        Parameters:
        identifiant - The username of the account
        typeDeCompte - The new type of the account

      • getAccounts

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> getAccounts()
        Get all accounts
        Returns:
        a list of 2 strings arrays (identifiant, typeDeCompte)
